Sentencas: The effect of YSZ (yttria stabilized zirconia) on the thermal cycling stability of commercial glass ceramics powders as a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) sealant material is investigated.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling

Sentencas: Four different composite sealants are prepared including 1, 3, 5 and 10 wt% of YSZ with respect to the total powders.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling

Sentencas: A sealant without YSZ is also prepared as the base case for comparison.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling

Sentencas: The fabrication of the sealant is achieved by using cost-effective tape casting routes.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling

Sentencas: The samples are then placed between two metallic interconnectors and a high temperature glass forming process is performed.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling

Sentencas: The mechanical performances are measured via tensile tests before and after a number of thermal cycles.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling

Sentencas: The results indicate that the fracture strength is adversely affected by the amount of YSZ loading due to reduced glass ceramics powders in the composites.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling

Sentencas: However, when the thermal cycling stability is the issue, the samples with YSZ show relatively small rate of decrease.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling

Sentencas: Therefore, the addition of YSZ is found to be beneficial for improving the thermal cycle stability of glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling

Sentencas: The optimum YSZ content is determined to be 5 wt%, since these samples exhibit almost a stable mechanical performance after each thermal cycles considered in this study.
Titulo: Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling
Strength evaluation of glass-ceramic composites containing yttria stabilized zirconia after thermal cycling
